node.description:
# Invoice Summarizer

Leverage the **Needle Search API** and an **Agent** to gather and summarize your invoice data quickly and accurately.

## Prerequisites

* A **Collection** and an **API Key** from your [Needle.ai](https://needle-ai.com) deployment
* An [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/)

## Quickstart

1. Load your invoices into your Needle Collection. 

2. In the **Needle Search** tool, add your **Needle Collection ID** and **Needle API Key**.

3. In the **Agent** component, add your **OpenAI Key**.

4. Open the **Playground** and query your invoices. The **Agent** component determines the correct query and search size for data retrieval.
Create a prompt template with dynamic variables.

mode.info: Choose variable syntax for your template.
mode.name: mode

template.name: template
template.value:
You are a meticulous expense analyst with expertise in financial data analysis and cost categorization.  
Your role is to analyze invoices, break down expenses, identify spending patterns, and provide actionable cost-saving insights.  
You use available tools, such as a knowledge base search, to enhance your analysis.  
Provide structured and well-formatted responses.

tool_placeholder.info: A placeholder input for tool mode.
tool_placeholder.name: tool_placeholder

node.description: Display a chat message in the Playground.

clean_data.info: Whether to clean data before converting to string.
clean_data.name: clean_data

context_id.info: The context ID of the chat. Adds an extra layer to the local memory.
context_id.name: context_id

data_template.info: Template to convert Data to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Data's text key.
data_template.name: data_template

input_value.info: Message to be passed as output.
input_value.name: input_value

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.
session_id.name: session_id

should_store_message.info: Store the message in the history.
should_store_message.name: should_store_message

node.description: ### 💡 Add your OpenAI API key here 👇
### 💡 Add your Needle Search API key here 👇
A retriever that uses the Needle API to search collections.

collection_id.info: The ID of the Needle collection.
collection_id.name: collection_id

query.info: Enter your question here. In tool mode, you can also specify top_k parameter (min: 20).
query.name: query

tools_metadata.info: Modify tool names and descriptions to help agents understand when to use each tool.
tools_metadata.name: tools_metadata

value.description: needle. run(needle. collection_id: Message, needle. needle_api_key: FieldTypes.TEXT, needle. query: Message, needle. top_k: FieldTypes.INTEGER) - A retriever that uses the Needle API to search collections.
value.display_description: needle. run(needle. collection_id: Message, needle. needle_api_key: FieldTypes.TEXT, needle. query: Message, needle. top_k: FieldTypes.INTEGER) - A retriever that uses the Needle API to search collections.
value.name: run

top_k.info: Number of search results to return (min: 20).
top_k.name: top_k

node.description: Get chat inputs from the Playground.

context_id.info: The context ID of the chat. Adds an extra layer to the local memory.
context_id.name: context_id

files.info: Files to be sent with the message.
files.name: files

input_value.info: Message to be passed as input.
input_value.name: input_value
input_value.value: Analyze recent invoices and generate a detailed expense report.   Steps:   1. Group expenses and calculate total spend by vendor.   2. Calculate the gross total spend.   3. Identify potential cost-saving opportunities.   Provide the report in markdown format, including:   - Executive Summary   - Vendor-wise Breakdown   - Recommendations for Cost Optimization.

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.
session_id.name: session_id

should_store_message.info: Store the message in the history.
should_store_message.name: should_store_message

node.description: Define the agent's instructions, then enter a task to complete using tools.

add_current_date_tool.info: If true, will add a tool to the agent that returns the current date.
add_current_date_tool.name: add_current_date_tool

agent_description.info: The description of the agent. This is only used when in Tool Mode. Defaults to 'A helpful assistant with access to the following tools:' and tools are added dynamically. This feature is deprecated and will be removed in future versions.
agent_description.name: agent_description
agent_description.value: A helpful assistant with access to the following tools:

context_id.info: The context ID of the chat. Adds an extra layer to the local memory.
context_id.name: context_id

format_instructions.info: Generic Template for structured output formatting. Valid only with Structured response.
format_instructions.name: format_instructions
format_instructions.value: You are an AI that extracts structured JSON objects from unstructured text. Use a predefined schema with expected types (str, int, float, bool, dict). Extract ALL relevant instances that match the schema - if multiple patterns exist, capture them all. Fill missing or ambiguous values with defaults: null for missing values. Remove exact duplicates but keep variations that have different field values. Always return valid JSON in the expected format, never throw errors. If multiple objects can be extracted, return them all in the structured format.

handle_parsing_errors.info: Should the Agent fix errors when reading user input for better processing?
handle_parsing_errors.name: handle_parsing_errors

input_value.info: The input provided by the user for the agent to process.
input_value.name: input_value

max_iterations.info: The maximum number of attempts the agent can make to complete its task before it stops.
max_iterations.name: max_iterations

n_messages.info: Number of chat history messages to retrieve.
n_messages.name: n_messages

output_schema.info: Schema Validation: Define the structure and data types for structured output. No validation if no output schema.
output_schema.name: output_schema

table_schema.description: Specify the name of the output field.
table_schema.name: name

table_schema.description: Describe the purpose of the output field.
table_schema.name: description

table_schema.description: Indicate the data type of the output field (e.g., str, int, float, bool, dict).
table_schema.name: type

table_schema.description: Set to True if this output field should be a list of the specified type.
table_schema.name: multiple

system_prompt.info: System Prompt: Initial instructions and context provided to guide the agent's behavior.
system_prompt.name: system_prompt
system_prompt.value: You are a helpful assistant that can use tools to answer questions and perform tasks.

tools.info: These are the tools that the agent can use to help with tasks.
tools.name: tools

description: Your AI Agent Accountant - Leverage Needle with Langflows Agent.
name: Invoice Summarizer
